title.rendered: COVID-19: Managing the Risks to your Cyber Security

content.rendered:
Coronavirus (COVID-19) has impacted business and lives around the world. As the pandemic intensifies cyber criminals continue to take advantage and phishing attacks and ransomware are set to rise.

Our security services can help support business uncover vulnerabilities and assess risk, including:

  • Vulnerability assessment 
  • Network penetration test
  • Web application test
  • Cloud configuration review
  • Webinar-based security awareness training
  • 24-7-365 incident response
  • Managed detection and response (MDR)
